diary.title: Creator's Log
diary.paragraph1: I'm a Recovering Theatre Kid–dramatic, emotional, charismatic, sparkly, larger than life–all fuelled by caffeine and Zoloft. As an introverted extrovert, I'm chaotically balanced between a life on the stage as a performer and life as a hermited music producer, composer, and songwriter.
diary.paragraph2: My production style mixes dusty guitars and grandiose harmonies in an attempt to leave you feeling sparkly and weightless. This little corner of the internet is my digital scrapbook and sonic universe. Feel free to get lost in it.

press.title: Press & Praise
items: My album was featured in Exclaim's “22 Great Canadian Albums You Might Have Missed in 2024”.
I was included in Exclaim! magazine's "8 new artists you have to hear".
Recovering Theatre Kid charted on the !earshot national Top 50.
I scored the short film Ojichaag by Rachel Beaulieu of Can Dream Productions.
I was also the proud loser of 'Producer of the Year' at the 2024 Western Canadian Music Awards.

collective.title: The Good + Plenty Arts Collective
collective.paragraph1: I'm the founder and director of this non-profit organization. We seek to diversify the Manitoba arts scene by providing more opportunities and resources for women, 2Spirit, non-binary, and gender diverse individuals interested in music production and audio engineering.
collective.paragraph2: The Good + Plenty Arts Collective won the Rising Leader award at the Women in Music Canada Honours 2024, and was nominated two years in a row for Community Excellence at the Western Canadian Music Awards.

locked.title: You found the key!
locked.paragraph1: Welcome to the V.I.P. lounge (Very Important Person... that's you!).
locked.paragraph2: This is where I'll put a link to a secret message board, or maybe unreleased demos and lyric sheets. A place for the real ones. Thanks for being here.

about.title: About
about.content:
Lana Winterhalt is a signed Songwriter and Composer with High Priestess Publishing (Toronto, ON). Currently working from her home studio (Good + Plenty Studios), Lana is passionate about building evocative soundscapes for listeners to get lost in—but what won’t get lost? Your voice.

Throughout the entire process, Lana relies heavily on her experience as a professional performing artist and multi-instrumentalist, trusting her ear and following wherever the passion leads.

services.title: Services
services.content:
Mentorship & Education

Lana can help you start your home studio, walk you through a release strategy, or provide hands-on workshops in songwriting, at-home recording, and artist development.

Composition

A multi-instrumentalist and sonic world-builder, Lana can compose for short films, documentaries, horror, comedy, and commercials.

Production & Engineering

Want Lana to help produce or engineer your song? Let's get to the root of your music and paint the picture with as many colours, textures, and layers as you want.

Rates

Lana’s rates are flexible per project and on a sliding scale. She is passionate about making production accessible for IBPOC, single parents, and members of gender/sexual minority groups. Reach out to discuss your project!

clients.title: Credits
clients.content:
Client Releases

  • Selci “Love Adorned (Lana Winterhalt Remix) - remixed, August 2023
  • Maggie Collins “She Knows” - engineered, produced, mixed, mastered, June 2023
  • Maggie Collins “Another Round” - engineered, produced, mixed, April 2023
  • Syd Bomek “I Kinda Like It” - co-produced and mixed, September 2022
  • Syd Bomek “Insane” - engineered, all instrumentals, mixed, November 2022

Songwriting & Training

  • Canadian Songwriter Challenge (as producer), 2023
  • BA, Minor in Music, 2015
  • Women In The Studio National Accelerator, 2021
  • Mentorship with JP Peters of Private Ear Recording, 2021-2022

gear.title: Studio Gear
gear.content:
Microphones

TLM103, SM7B, SM57, SM58, Sennheiser e935

Instruments

Squier Telecaster, Seagull Performer CW Acoustic, Gretsch short scale bass, Oscar Schmidt ukulele, misc. vintage folk guitars, trumpet, Native Instruments Komplete Kontrol S88, Arturia Minilab 2, BBC Core Orchestra (plug-in)

Technical

Logic ProX, Scarlett 18i20, Fender Deluxe Reverb (Digital), Boss VE-20 Vocal Performer
